summary: The diff implements all 6 requirements with comprehensive frontend and backend code. The implementation includes user profiles (REQ-1), post creation and feed (REQ-2), like functionality (REQ-3), commenting system (REQ-4), vibrant UI with warm colors and rounded design (REQ-5), and image asset display (REQ-6). No missing requirements were identified. However, there are hallucinated features that were explicitly marked as non-goals in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Avatar upload functionality for user profiles
hallucinated_features.reason: The backend includes updateAvatar() function and avatar storage/display in profile system. The BuildRequest only requested username, bio, and avatar display, not avatar upload capability.

hallucinated_features.description: Authentication and authorization system with access control
hallucinated_features.reason: The backend implements comprehensive access control with user permissions, registration, and role-based access (AccessControl, MixinAuthorization). The BuildRequest makes no mention of authentication requirements beyond basic user identity.

The backend integrates a full blob storage system (Storage, MixinStorage) for handling avatars and potentially other media. This goes beyond the stated requirements which only mention displaying pre-generated static images.
